text: Tun Abdul Ghafar bin Baba (; 18 February 1925 â€“ 23 April 2006) was a Malaysian politician. He was Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia from 1986 to 1993. On 23 April 2006, he died in Kuala Lumpur from heart and respiratory failure.http://thestar.com.my/news/story.asp?file=/2006/4/24/nation/14044647&sec;=nationhttp://thestar.com.my/news/story.asp?file=/2006/4/24/nation/14046759&sec;=nation ==Related pages== *Tun Abdul Ghafar Baba Memorial ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Negeri Sembilan Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Malaysia
